official_title: A bill to amend the Act of October 21, 1970, establishing the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain highways owned by Benzie and Leelanau Counties, Michigan, in the lakeshore.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to purchase up to 80 miles of highway and highway right-of-way located in the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore in Michigan from Benzie and Leelanau Counties.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of October 21, 1970, establishing the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain highways owned by Benzie and Leelanau Counties, Michigan, in the lakeshore.
